beers.name: Miłosław Pilzner
beers.description: While pilsner is the most popular beer style in Poland, Browar Fortuna has refused to follow the crowd. One gulp of "Miłosław" is sufficient to realise that it is not just another lager. Its different flavour and aroma is attributed to the open fermentation process, as well as the varieties of hops used in its production. They are used by the so-called craft breweries, which target their unique products at smaller, yet extremely loyal groups of consumers on the lookout for something different in the world of beer.
